    • build

      public PipelineConfiguration build() throws IllegalStateException
      Returns a new PipelineConfiguration instance. The builder is reusable after this call and the returned instance is independent of it.
      Returns:
      a new Revapi pipeline configuration
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if there are no api analyzers or no reporters added.
